about_the_game:
Trapped in a mysterious mansion, a tiny sparrow must survive deadly encounters with horrific creatures as it unravels the mansion's dark secrets and desperately tries to escape. Explore vents, crawlspaces, secret rooms, and more to uncover the gripping story and world of SPARROW.

Survival Horror

Experience horror like never before as you play as a tiny bird in a very large world. From the sparrow's perspective, you must navigate through an old mansion with nothing but your wings to guide you. Survive deadly encounters with spiders, wasps, cats, and many more monstrosities as you attempt to find your way out.

Story Rich

As you make your way through the mansion there's a story to be unraveled. Journey through ventilation shafts, sub-walls, crawlspaces, plumbing, attics, and more while along the way unlocking and discovering the tale of what's happening in this isolated place. Always remember, you are not alone.

Freedom of Flight

To survive the world of SPARROW, your wings are your main asset. Experience the freedom of movement with the ability to fly throughout your environment. Use your wings to solve puzzles and escape terrifying creatures that normal grounded movement wouldn't allow. Mastering flight is the only way to progress.

content_descriptors.notes: SPARROW features features blood, gore, and violence and may not be suitable for all ages.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 Super or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
